subject: p13135946
Findings: PA and lateral views of the chest. A PICC line ends in the mid-to-low SVC. Small bilateral pleural effusions seen only on the lateral view have decreased since. Aside from minimal atelectasis at the posterior left lung base, the lungs are clear. The aorta is tortuous but not dilated. Heart size is normal.
Impression: Minimal left basal atelectasis. Small bilateral pleural effusions, decreased in size compared to. No evidence of aspiration.
